#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
vector < int> a[1000002];
vector <int> b[1000002];

void freeit()
{
	int i;
	for(i=0;i<1000002;i++)
	{
		a[i].clear();
		b[i].clear();
	}
}

int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
	int n,k,i;
	scanf("%d%d",&n,&k);
	int a1,a2;
	for(i=0;i<k;i++)
	{
		scanf("%d%d",&a1,&a2);
		a[a1].push_back(a2);
		b[a2].push_back(a1);
	}
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		if(i-1-b[i].size()+a[i].size()==n-1)
			break;
	if(i!=n+1)
		cout<<2<<" "<<i<<endl;
	else
		cout<<1<<endl;
	freeit();
	}
	return 0;
}
